task_description:
# Automated Notifications & Alerts

Implement comprehensive notification system with configurable alerts for identity-related events: password expiring, account locked, compliance violation, new employee detected, terminated employee access remaining.

## Rationale
Proactive notifications prevent issues before users are impacted. Password expiration notifications reduce help desk calls. Terminated employee alerts are critical for security. This moves WhoDis from reactive lookup to proactive identity monitoring.

## User Stories
- As an IT help desk agent, I want to be notified when employees' passwords are expiring so that I can proactively reach out
- As a security analyst, I want alerts when terminated employees still have access so that I can remediate quickly

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Notification configuration in admin panel
- [ ] Event types: Password expiring (configurable days), Account locked, Compliance violation, New employee in data warehouse, Terminated employee with active access
- [ ] Notification channels: Email, In-app notification center
- [ ] Recipient configuration: User, Manager, IT group, Custom email list
- [ ] Notification templates customizable
- [ ] Notification history with read receipts
- [ ] Ability to snooze or dismiss notifications
